title: Cafeterapie
typeOfFood: Lacto, International, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual cafe with small round tables. Menu is all vegetarian except for a couple non-veg sandwiches. Serves toast, coffee, milkshakes, and alcoholic beverages, hot vegetarian dishes with tofu and tempeh, salad, falafels, sandwiches, ratatouille. No smoking. Directions: From Charles Bridge on the east side of the river, walk south pass 3 bridges, Na Hrobci is just one block before the 4th bridge south of the Charles Bridge.
